      • grep

        public static Set<String> grep(String pattern,
                               int toggle)
        Finds every key or value in the database that contains a user-given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - substring being searched for
        toggle - 0 for key, 1 for value
        Returns:
        a Set of property keys or values that contain the pattern

      • findProp

        public static ArrayList<String> findProp(String pattern,
                                         String location,
                                         int toggle)
        Queries the database for a user-given key and returns location(s) and values(s) of the key.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the key or value being found
        location - a specific path within which to find the key
        toggle - 0 for key, 1 for value
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing each key location and value
